column1: Uchi////I think if I had to pick my top restaurant in Houston right now
column2: this would be it. This restaurant is just unbelievably good. The hamachi nabe is one of the best things I've ever tasted
column4: it can be a bit pricy but not too bad considering how nice it is. I'll probably right more later but for now I'll leave it at that. You need to try this place.
